official_title: A bill to appoint Charles Robert Allen, III in the grade of Captain in the Coast Guard Reserve.

summary.text: Directs the President to appoint a named individual to the grade of captain in the Coast Guard Reserve and transfer such individual to the Selected Reserve of the Coast Guard.

titles.title: A bill to appoint Charles Robert Allen, III in the grade of Captain in the Coast Guard Reserve.
